query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mauticSegments` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `mauticId` INT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  `alias` VARCHAR(255),
  `description` TEXT,
  `isPublished` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  `isGlobal` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP NULL,
  `syncedAt` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2Qbe3HsW4wtpjFA.78925f660202 --database CEz8GocwtDf6VgA5y5NN9x --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mauticSegments` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `mauticId` INT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  `alias` VARCHAR(255),
  `description` TEXT,
  `isPublished` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  `isGlobal` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP NULL,
  `syncedAt` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
